meanings.sent1: Grandma gave me a kopiyka for good luck.
meanings.sent2: I saved every kopiyka I earned in my piggy bank.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten batted the kopiyka around the room.
meanings.sent4: His words were as valuable as a rare kopiyka.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight glinted off the copper kopiyka in the fountain.
